meanings.definition: A skilled marksman who is able to shoot accurately and precisely.
meanings.sent1: The sharpshooters hit the bullseye every time at the shooting range.
meanings.sent2: The military trained sharpshooters to take down targets from a long distance.
meanings.sent3: The sharpshooters at the carnival game never missed a single target.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like sharpshooters, always finding the smallest details in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The sharpshooters in the movie never failed to impress with their incredible accuracy.

meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled or proficient in a particular activity or field.
meanings.sent1: The sharpshooters of the basketball team never missed a shot.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the sharpshooters of the dance group for her flawless moves.
meanings.sent3: The sharpshooters of the baking competition amazed everyone with their delicious creations.
meanings.sent4: His sharpshooters in negotiation always led to successful deals.
meanings.sent5: The sharpshooters of the art class could create masterpieces with just a pencil and paper.
